title: A Burglar Tries to Break into a Movie Star's Room
summary: A bad man named Kirk Holdrick tried to break into a house in London where actress Anya Taylor-Joy was staying with her husband. He and another man smashed a window to get inside. Anya and her husband heard the noise and locked themselves in a bedroom. The burglars tried to open the bedroom door, but Anya's husband scared them away by pretending he had a gun. The burglars ran off without taking anything. Kirk Holdrick is a criminal who has done bad things before. He was caught by the police and went to jail for breaking into this house and for another crime where he hurt people. Anya and her husband were very scared by what happened.

background_read: This story is about a break-in at a house in London where a famous actress, Anya Taylor-Joy, was staying. Break-ins are when people enter a house without permission, often to steal things. It can be very scary for the people inside. In this case, the burglars tried to get into the bedroom, but the couple inside stayed safe by locking the door and scaring them away. The police caught the burglar, and he was sent to jail because breaking into houses is against the law and can hurt people.
Article_Structure: WHO: Kirk Holdrick, a burglar, and Anya Taylor-Joy, an actress
WHAT: A break-in where burglars tried to enter a bedroom but were scared away
WHY: To show how a crime happened and that the burglar was punished

perspectives.description: The story teaches us about staying safe by locking doors and being brave in scary situations.
